page.title: 07ST.MICHAEL'S MOUNT CASTLE-2
page.content:
The castle has many old paintings and prints of the Mount, which show different times and events in its history. There are many family portraits and other fascinating items collected by the St. Aubyn family. These include a mummified cat from Egypt which is 2000 years old. It may be unwrapped in the year 2000 A.D.!
In the Church there is a low doorway which leads down to a dungeon. When first discovered this contained the skeleton of a man seven feet tall. The dungeon is said to have been used as a punishment cell for the monks when the castle was a monastery. It was built below the church so that the monks could hear the services while they were shut up in the dungeon.
